Name: Salmon Ninja
About the game: Salmon Ninja is a fast paced action platformer. With a handy grappling hook you can quickly traverse the environment by grabbing onto walls, ceilings, and even enemies. This combined with a trusty sword makes you a swift killer. You play as a tiny ninja lost in a strange and hostile world. With the help and guidance of a friendly salmon you try to make your way home.
